specializations: Type I collagen from tuna skin
notes: Premium marine collagen peptides supplier. ThalaCol™ is hydrolyzed marine collagen derived from sustainably sourced wild-caught tuna skin. Rich in Type I collagen with high purity and bioavailability. Benefits include anti-aging, skin rejuvenation, hydration, moisture retention, skin elasticity improvement, and collagen synthesis support. Applications include anti-aging skincare, moisturizing products, and skin firming formulations. Premium marine collagen positioning with sustainable and traceable sourcing.
